name: Flaming Pixels
description:
Do you want something bright, funny and a little crazy? We are pleased to introduce Flaming Pixels - simple yet incredibly exciting arcade platformer!

Pixel characters and dynamic 8-bit music coupled with an excellent gameplay - take a dive into the retro atmosphere!

The unique and crazy physics of the movement - non-stop jumps and ricochet off any surface! This requires the highest skills to control your character properly.HIGH JUMPHow high can you climb, bouncing from the walls and platforms? Mighty power of ricochet and the amazing natural jumping ability will help you! Conquer the new heights and set the records.
